Title: Grasping for Salvation
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Tiller Russell
Actors: Jason Beghe, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer, Patrick John Flueger
Plot: Voight uncovers a connection between the murder of a teenage boy and a 17-year-old case.
